IMU configuration

Requirements

  • A Windows PC

  • The IMU Sensor

  • A USB-A to USB-C cable

Configuration

  1. Connect the IMU to your PC

  2. Download and start WitMotion PC Software

  3. Select the JY901 device in the “Frequently used devices” section

  1. Your device should appear on the left

  1. Open the config menu and configure your device as follows :
